The Marc Palo Alto is a professionally managed apartment community offering high-rise living with an urban signature feel.

Our prestigious downtown community is located in the heart of downtown Palo Alto which boasts a gold mine of tree-lined streets with a wealth of activities, shops and chic restaurants for your enjoyment.

The Marc is also conveniently located within walking distance to the Caltrain Station, city bus stops, and within close proximity to Stanford University, Stanford Hospital, Addison Elementary School, Jordan Middle School & Palo Alto High School.
We now book our in-person, virtual and self-guided appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Visit our Website for a Virtual Tour:
The Marc, Palo Alto redefines urban living.
This prestigious downtown community is located near popular University Avenue, restaurants, shopping and vibrant nightlife.

Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
This bedroom one/bathroom one unit features a spacious bedroom closet, with three additional closets/storage spaces, a living room/dining area and large balcony.
The kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, which is open to the living space.
The floor to ceiling windows provide beautiful views and plentiful light.
Last, the large balcony extends the unit into the great outdoors, and is an excellent perch to take in the views!
The Marc, Palo Alto (Call Us Home)
